Name: Locative vs posessive

\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 ###Locative vs posessive\par
\par
Locative\par
Kaplumba\f1\u287?alar onlarda.\f0  They have the turtles.\f2\lang1049\par
\f3\lang1055 B\f0\lang1033\'fc\f3\lang1055 y\f0\lang1033\'fc\f3\lang1055 k domates sende. \f0\lang1033 You have the big tomato.\par
\f3\lang1055 Gen\f0\lang1033\'e7\f3\lang1055  filler onda. \f0\lang1033 She has the young elephants.\par
\'d6\f3\lang1055 rdek bende. \f0\lang1033 I have the duck.\par
\f3\lang1055 Pasta onda. \f0\lang1033 She has the cake.\par
k\'fc\'e7\'fck yenge\'e7 onlarda. They have the small crab.\par
k\'fc\'e7\'fck kedi bizde. We have the little cat.\par
Benim kedim orada. My cat is (over) there.\par
Kediler kalede s\'fct i\'e7er. (NOT \f3\lang1055 Kediler s\f0\lang1033\'fc\f3\lang1055 t i\f0\lang1033\'e7\f3\lang1055 er kalede\f0\lang1033 ) The cats drink milk in the castle.\par
Bah\'e7ede, kahvalt\f1\u305?day\u305?m.\f3\lang1055  I am in the garden, at breakfast.\f0\lang1033\par
Kahvalt\f1\u305?da kimin \f0\'e7ocuklar\f1\u305? var?\f3\lang1055  Whose children are at the breakfast?\f0\lang1033\par
\f2\lang1049 Ankara'da g\f0\lang1033\'fczel bir kad\f1\u305?n\f2\lang1049 . A beautiful woman in Ankara.\par
\f0\lang1033 There is a beautiful woman in Ankara - Ankara'da g\'fczel bir kad\f1\u305?n var\f0 .\par
Ankara'da \'e7ok kedi var. There are many cats in Ankara. There are a lot of cats in Ankara.\par
Orada kim var? Who is there?\par
Ben mutfaktay\f1\u305?m.\f0  i am in the kitchen. - \f2\lang1049\'f0\'e0\'e7\'ee\'e1\'f0\'e0\'f2\'fc \f0\lang1033 yim\par
\par
posessive\par
Onlar\f1\u305?n kitaplar\u305? var.\f0  They have books.\par
locative\par
Kitaplar sizde. you have the books.\par
\f2\lang1049\par
}
TxtContent:
###Locative vs posessive

Locative
Kaplumbağalar onlarda. They have the turtles.
Büyük domates sende. You have the big tomato.
Genç filler onda. She has the young elephants.
Ördek bende. I have the duck.
Pasta onda. She has the cake.
küçük yengeç onlarda. They have the small crab.
küçük kedi bizde. We have the little cat.
Benim kedim orada. My cat is (over) there.
Kediler kalede süt içer. (NOT Kediler süt içer kalede) The cats drink milk in the castle.
Bahçede, kahvaltıdayım. I am in the garden, at breakfast.
Kahvaltıda kimin çocukları var? Whose children are at the breakfast?
Ankara'da güzel bir kadın. A beautiful woman in Ankara.
There is a beautiful woman in Ankara - Ankara'da güzel bir kadın var.
Ankara'da çok kedi var. There are many cats in Ankara. There are a lot of cats in Ankara.
Orada kim var? Who is there?
Ben mutfaktayım. i am in the kitchen. - разобрать yim

posessive
Onların kitapları var. They have books.
locative
Kitaplar sizde. you have the books.
